sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Search::Insurance

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT org.org_id, ins.product_name, ins.plan_name, addr.line1, addr.city, addr.state, ins.ins_internal_id FROM insurance ins, insurance_address addr, org WHERE ins.ins_internal_id = addr.parent_id AND org.org_internal_id = ins.ins_org_id AND UPPER(addr.city) = ? AND ( (ins.owner_org_id = ?) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM org_association assn WHERE assn.assn_org_internal_id = ins.owner_org_id AND assn.org_internal_id = ? AND assn.org_assn_type = 100 AND assn.org_assn_status = 0 ) ) ORDER BY 1 ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT org.org_id, ins.product_name, ins.plan_name, addr.line1, addr.city, addr.state, ins.ins_internal_id FROM insurance ins, insurance_address addr, org WHERE ins.ins_internal_id = addr.parent_id AND org.org_internal_id = ins.ins_org_id AND UPPER(addr.city) = ? AND ( (ins.owner_org_id = ?) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM org_association assn WHERE assn.assn_org_internal_id = ins.owner_org_id AND assn.org_internal_id = ? AND assn.org_assn_type = 100 AND assn.org_assn_status = 0 ) ) AND ins.record_type = 2 ORDER BY 1 ) WHERE rownum <= 250
